column4: hi. is there a autohotkey equivalent in ubuntu? I wish to automate a java application by sending keystrokes and mouse click events
hi. is there a autohotkey equivalent in ubuntu? I wish to automate a java application by sending keystrokes and mouse click events
if you mean an apps that can handle keybindings and mousebindings with configurable commands, check xbindkeys
sure, but it only handles one-line commands, no complete functions; so scripts are ok, yes
